body.name: ZOZOO 100ft Led Lights for Bedroom(2 Rolls of 50ft), Smart RGB Led Strip Lights with 44-Key Remote & APP Control Music Sync with Color Changing for Home Party Festival Decoration

features: 【Dual Control Options】You can choose colors and lighting modes (like Flash, Jump, Fade,etc), adjust the brightness and shining speed, DIY your unique colors with IR remote and APP control (by Bluetooth) to fit the atmosphere for your home. The led strip lights for bedroom also allows you preset time to turn on or off it at certain times to enjoy smart home life.

【Sync with Music】Built-in sensitive microphone, the led light strips can change colors and speed by detecting the rhythm of the surrounding sound and music. This ambience lights let you keep up with the rhythm dancing and enjoying the dynamic party atmosphere.

【Dynamic and Dimmable Lights】High-quality LED chips provide 16 million color changes, allow the led light to be colorful and durable. Dimmable lighting support multiple scenes and create a warm and romantic atmosphere for you.

【Great for Decorations】The led lights for bedroom 100 ft is a suitable house ornament, especially for festival needs.You can use it for the decoration of bedroom, living room, hotel, club, bar, classroom, party, wedding, etc. It’s also great as a birthday gift and Christmas gift.

【Easy Installation】With strong adhesive, the led lights for room can be firmly stick on a dry and flat surface and bend or shape freely. Please test the led light strip before installation and install it carefully. If you have any questions during use, please contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multifunctional RGB led strip lights for whole room will look more stunning to decorate your vibrant life.
A colorful smart led strip brings you a visual feast! You can enjoy exciting moments with your family and friends under the fascinating lights.
Share the wonderful time with your kids. It's the perfect decoration for your kid’s room to create a dream world.

Color mode: Choose your favorite colors and brightness of the RGB lights to fit the atmosphere of your room . Scene mode: The leds lights show different colors and frequencies in different scenes. Music mode: Colors change with the rhythm of music, make your party up to the high peak. Microphone mode: Built in sensitive microphone, make the lights change colors with the surrounding sounds. Timer setting mode: Easily manage the led strips, which automatically lights up at night and goes off when you fall asleep.

Decorative lights for holidays, events, parties, shows, exhibitions. Applicable also for the decoration of TV back light, computer. Lighting for bedroom, living room, kitchen, cabinet, hotels, clubs, bars, malls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two enthusiastic thumbs up!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has had these for about 6 months, I think, and uses them daily. She loves the soft lights in the evening and the many color options. They adhered well, remote works perfectly, great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The lights are awesome and stick very well to the wall but I did notice on certain colors not all the lights light up. There's a few little sections that don't light up when i change the colors mostly with red. Other than that it's a great and very bright! My kids are extremely happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Setting them up is easy because they have their own adhesive and it holds on strong, they're super bright but csn be dimmed with the app or controller, I suggest using the app because the remote needs to be pointed to the little adapter or else it won't work. I love the colors and quality, I think for the price these are even better than other exensive light strips out there. The leds are spaced out however so you can see the dots, doesn't look like a line like some expensive led strips do, I ctually like the dotted spaced out ones however so it's not an issue for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These lights look great and work well. I love the look of them and how easy they were to put up. My only criticism is that I bought two sets and on both rolls the last 2 feet of the lights stopped working after first use. Overall they met all my expectations and were very well priced compared to other places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kids love these!!
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and they look awesome! Comes with remote and different settings for lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright LED Lights for a fraction of the price!
reviews.reviewText: These were super easy to install/hang up! LED lights are super bright and I appreciate that they come with a remote to control functions and changing light colors is easy. Haven't quite figured out the DIY options just yet but I'll be messing with those settings and I will update my review. This was a great buy for a fraction of the price most LED Light start at.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get ready for disco parties in the bedroom
reviews.reviewText: So I love doing reviews after having a product for a long while and we have had these for over a year. They are easy to install as they have sticky tape on the back of them. I am hoping she won't get sick of these because I am pretty sure taking rhem down is gonna result in them ripping her paint off (I cannot be 100 percent sure of that since we haven't tried to get them off yet but most things with super sticky tape will rip paint off) the only real downside is when you are putting them up on the wall...if you want to turn them to come down the wall you have to sort of bend them amd then continue..pics included.Other than those 2 things my daughter loves these. Tons of different color options, disco party option which makes me and my eyes feel crazy... They go quick, they go slow, the fade and jump! It's all controlled my remote ans easy to use. My other 2 actually asked for them also so 2 more sets will be under the tree this year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars they're great but...
reviews.reviewText: they are amazing i love them the color, brightness, adhesive, everything was great except installation. i was putting them up and they kept twisting which messed up the adhesive. when i was using the first roll i was about to continue to put them up but then the rope snapped somehow and now the whole rest of the 1st roll is wasted. it's a good product but you have to be careful 🤷🏼‍♀️

reviews.reviewTitle: Three leds don't work in the "red" mode.
reviews.reviewText: Three lousy leds don't work in the "red" mode. WTH?
